lead_paragraph: Shares of American Express sank more than 12 percent after the company said it would slash spending to cope with the rising dollar.

headline.print_headline: Shares Advance for a Second Day, Led by Rocketing Oil Prices
headline.main: Market Picks Up Steam as Oil Prices Rise

snippet: Shares of American Express sank more than 12 percent after the company said it would slash spending to cope with the rising dollar.
abstract: Stocks make their biggest gains in four months, lifted by surging oil prices and gains in technology sector.
